section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on December 30, 2021.*
section.heading: Independent fiduciary.
section.text: The Chief Financial Officer may enter into a contract with an independent fiduciary to administer the Fund and the CTF Program.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-681.04, see § 5 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Nov. 1, 2021, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 5 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Nov. 1, 2021, 0 DCR 0).
